Detailed Description

Service to receive collected statistics about running nodes

This service is invoked by the ServiceStat service on the node which was registered as a consummer of global statistics. The derived service should be binded to Net::ServiceManager::NETWORK_LNS, Net::RECVSTAT_SERVICE. A default (void) service is defined on all nodes.
